task_summary: Robot arm navigates around an obstacle (books) to reach the blue pen on a table by first perceiving the pen, then approaching a waypoint that circumvents the obstacle, before moving directly to the pen.

task_long_description.overview: A single robotic arm is required to reach the blue pen on the table while avoiding the obstacle formed by a stack of books. The workspace includes the pen, books obstructing the direct path, and a pen holder. The robot perceives the pen, plans a safe approach trajectory to bypass the books, and then moves to the pen. Both perception and navigation are sequential and explicit. All steps monitor success before proceeding.
preconditions: Blue pen is present and visible on the table.
Books are positioned directly between robot and pen, forming an obstacle.
Robot is initialized and ready to execute motion.
stepwise_plan: Check if blue pen is visible; retry scan if needed.
Detect and localize blue pen precisely.
Move to an intermediate waypoint circumventing obstacle.
Move from approach_point to blue pen.
success_criteria: Robot arm arrives at the blue pen without colliding with books.
All navigational steps succeed in order.
Pen remains in place and undamaged.
failure_and_recovery: Failure to perceive pen triggers up to 3 scan retries.
task_long_description.termination: Sequence terminates when robot is verified at the blue pen location or on critical failure.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Returns true if blue pen is currently visible to sensors.
Performs a raster scan up to 3 times to locate blue pen.
Executes image-based detection of blue pen.
Moves arm to a safe waypoint that avoids obstacle.
Checks if robot is positioned at the intermediate waypoint.
Moves arm from waypoint to blue pen.
Checks if robot is positioned at the pen.

failure_modes: Pen not detected due to occlusion or poor perception.
MoveTo fails due to obstacle pathing or collision.
Timeout in approach or navigation; arm movement interrupted.
recovery_strategy: Retry scan for pen up to 3 times.
Abort further movement and signal error if navigation fails.
assumptions: The instruction implies obstacle avoidance; frames show books obstructing direct arm motion to pen.
Pen is not grasped, only approached; grasp omitted as it is not evidenced in frames.
Intermediate waypoint (approach_point) is necessary to circumvent obstacle.

expected_success_criteria: Robot reaches blue pen location without contacting books.
